a.n: A Girls' Getaway: Lucia Love & Stella Cox

p.k: Girls weekend out! The girls used to go away together each year, but it has already been 5 years. Amy organized another girly weekend after a desperate call of her friend Cath, who just found out her husband is having an affair. They needed a relaxing weekend away again to the English countryside. They didn?t expect it to be this hot
